phrases: Hey, I told you to look over here.
Who would have thought he would come to get his suit now?
Do not run after it without thinking.
So this is how it got Shigechi?
That is why we could not find him, no matter where we looked.
Do not go after him, Koichi.
we will get to see the face of the person who killed Reimi and Shigechi!
We need to cautiously observe and act, Koichi.
We just happened to miss the name tag on that jacket.
But considering how big the jacket was,
we can tell that the guy's about 175 centimeters tall.
He is an office employee, and not married.
he would not have brought his jacket here for a button repair.
He is between the ages of 25 and 35, and he looks pretty rich.
Judging from the material and design, that jacket was a high-end brand.
Even if we do not follow him now,
we have significantly narrowed down who it might be.
That does not mean we should not go after him!
It is not that I do not want to pursue him, but we cannot.
Because that bomb Stand is somewhere over there.
I did not see it, but it must be there.
Slowly walk outside through the door.
How can you know it must be there if you cannot see it?
If he were the kind of guy to leave right after getting rid of the shop owner,
then he never could have kept getting away with killing for fifteen years.
He is someone who gets rid of all evidence.
Which means he plans to get rid of us.
Are not you being too cautious?
If the Stand is not here,
the murderer must be far away with that jacket by now.
Observing does not simply mean to look.
It does not mean to just listen, but to listen well.
H-He is sounding high-and-mighty, but my Reverb is not useless.
It is matured a lot, so is not Jotaro underestimating me a bit?
I wonder if the bomb Stand is really still around.
If it is not, we are going to look really stupid!
I-If I keep touching it, it will explode!
After all those hits I landed...
I hate doing anything that is tiring, so I am going to destroy you now.
Now no matter how much we touch it, it will not explode!
I will make sure the people searching for me
My Deadly Queen's Heart Attack always gets its prey, no matter what.
It was not destroyed by Star Platinum's power!
A-A Stand that is this hard...
It has not slowed down at all!
Y-You have hit it so much that you are hurt,
but it has not sustained any damage!
It will explode if you are touching it!
I have never met such a sturdy Stand.
I think my confidence is going to break first.
J-Jotaro, at this rate, it is going to blow us up!
You need to get further away.
This time, I am going to take it apart for sure.
I-I would like to say something.
A Stand controlled from far away
does not move with that much power.
But that thing's power and explosive attacks...
The power behind those explosions would not be possible if the user was not nearby.
The user should be within fifteen... no, ten meters of here!
My Reverb has a range of fifty meters!
You just need to think about protecting yourself with your Reverb.
The culprit is no longer nearby.
This is a remotely controlled Stand.
I have had many encounters with various Stands, so I know.
Its actions are too simple for it to be controlled from nearby.
That is not logical at all!
There is no way a Stand that powerful can be controlled from far away.
The user has to be close by!
So Jotaro really is underestimating me.
I can find the culprit and defeat him, too!
He is more than fifty meters away...
And he is only getting further away.
Th-The bomb Stand is being controlled from far away?
Having that power and being that far away is inconceivable!
That Stand goes after things with higher temperatures first.
That is why it is so powerful, despite being controlled from far away.
Bring out Reverb and protect yourself!
Even if I stop time, you are too far away!
fifty meters away, where the culprit is!
The reason this thing attacked the shop owner first
was because he had a hot drink.
his body temperature rose from being so worked up.
If there is something hotter, it should go toward that.
Time has begun to move again.
It goes after things with the highest temperature first.
But if body temperature is enough to make it explode,
then when it is near fire...
This is all my fault, Jotaro!
This happened because I went after the culprit.
If he had not caused the fire for my sake, it would not have gotten him!
That explosion was not a human!
It is going to deal the final blow!
It is just like Jotaro said!
It will attack something that is hotter than body temperature first.
I have to take this chance to run!
There is plenty of heat here!
I need to buy some time and run out that door.
It is not a gas stove!
Why does this house have an electric stove?!
It is going to take some time to warm up!
There should be some hot water.
If I observe carefully, like Jotaro said...
A weakness I did not notice earlier!
And I am starting to get pissed off.
Why do I have to regretfully run away
in fear from a murderer, like, Please, God, save me?
Should not it be the other way around?
Why do I have to think that I would rather
be looking for a public restroom while
I have diarrhea if I could only get out of this situation safely?
The one who should be running away in fear...
It always attacks based on temperature...
But that is exactly what your weakness is!
The fact that you never give up on that is your weakness!
It is been almost three minutes.
I do not know what is going on at that shoe store,
but there is one thing I can say with more faith than anything in this world.
It will track down its target, no matter what.
Since that is over with, I have to call Josuke on the phone.
Now that thing's lost track of us.
Keep chasing after the word sizzle forever...
Just like a donkey chasing after a carrot hanging in front of its face.
That is what your weakness is.
Jotaro is hurt bad, and it is my fault.
Do not say that so suddenly!
I do not get what you are talking about!
Just hurry up and get over here.
I have captured his Stand here.
Say it so I can understand!
I turned it off, but now it is getting hotter and hotter.
What is with this piece of crap?
How can you cook anything good with this?!
I am asking you where you are, Koichi!
It is ignoring the letters and coming this way!
Hurry up and tell me, you dumbass!
That explosion was not a human.
It is coming after me again.
But I cannot use the tail letters anymore.
Wh-What am I going to do?
Act 2 was killed in the explosion!
If the explosion killed it, I would be dead too, because I am the user.
It looked like Reverb died once before, too.
Um, is that who you are, sir?
D-Does this mean I have grown?!
Er, I do not know what your powers are, so... F-For now...
It has way more speed than Act 1 and Act 2!
This enemy has a seriously heavy power.
I am telling you to protect us!
We have not grown at all!
This is taking far too long.
Why is Heart Attack taking so long?
My left hand that released Heart Attack just suddenly...
Allow me to pay for the cup.
I will be leaving, so can I get my check?
It feels like there is a 40 or 50 kilogram weight on it.
What is going on over there?
Please, allow me to give you a hand.
It is sunken into the pavement and having a hard time moving...
I have rhymed three and free.
There is really nothing to explain about it.
For whatever reason, Heart Attack has gotten heavy.
I have to go retrieve Heart Attack myself.
Episode 24 H eart A ttack, Part 2
